p: The encapsulation of thymol in the potato-starch–polysorbate–glycerol–citric acid complex dispersion and related cast films was demonstrated [ 134]. The results proved the antioxidant and antimicrobial capacity of potato starch dispersions enriched with polysorbate-thymol micelles, only in the presence of polysorbate-thymol micelles, but with lower levels than polysorbate–thymol alone. It was concluded on the necessity to evaluate the biocompatibility of these materials.
